data.author: singleserveapps

changelog.release_notes: -- Added support for Pebble 2 (Diorite) watches
-- Recompiled using Pebble SDK 4

-- Now the "Twelve o'clock marker" color option can be used to change the color of the twelve o'clock dot or hour marker
-- Slightly updated alignment of digital time display
-- Added an option to always display a seconds hand
-- Improved method for checking elapsed time since last weather update
-- Switched weather provider from Yahoo! Weather to OpenWeatherMap.org
- Slightly lengthened the watch hands
- Fixed an issue with retrieving Yahoo! Weather using GPS (credit: Freakified)
- Improvements to battery usage
- Added option to shake to briefly display a seconds hand
-- Updated to display "....." for "Unknown" Yahoo! Weather conditions
-- Fixed an issue when Yahoo! Weather returned an 'Unknown' weather condition
- Slightly decreased the width of the default watch hands

- Minor alignment updates for text items
- Optimizing battery, digital time and date information updates

- Added minute markers display option for Pebble Time (Basalt)
- Removed 3, 6, 9 dots display option
- Includes a fix for weather information not updating for some Android devices

- Added option to change the color for hour/minute hands and dial markers
- Corrected issue where battery information wouldn't apply text color
- Added option to display minute marker lines for Pebble Time Round (Chalk)

- Added option to display battery percentage
- Corrected issue where last weather update time could display with incorrect 12/24hr value

- Added thinner watch hand option
- Minor alignment updates for date and digital time elements

data.description:
Inspired by Pebble's Tictoc watchface with added weather and date information.

- Select colors for hour/minute hands, time markers, background and text items
- Select how often OpenWeatherMap.org weather information is updated
- Retrieve weather information using GPS or by manually entering location
- Option to display today's lo - hi temperatures (+last weather update time)
- Option to always display a seconds hand, or battery-friendly alternative to briefly display a seconds hand with a shake
- Vibrate on Bluetooth disconnect option
- Select from two different font sizes and watch hand widths
- Options to display time in digital format and battery percentage

If you're enjoying the TICTOC WEATHER watchface, please click the heart above. You may also send feedback using the Support link below.
data.title: Tictoc Weather
